trans-unit.source: Specifies the style characteristics for the title bars of Web Parts controls within a zone.
The TitleStyle class is used with zones to specify common style characteristics that apply to the title bars of Web Parts controls within the zones.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartTitleStyle%2A> property contains a reference to a TitleStyle object for each zone.
A title bar for a control is rendered at run time as an HTML table cell.

Because the TitleStyle class inherits from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> class, it allows you to set stylistic attributes for a title bar similar to the attributes for any table cell.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.TitleStyle"></xref> class.
Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.TitleStyle> class.
The constructor sets the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.TitleStyle.Wrap%2A> property to `false`.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the contents of the title bar for a part control wrap in the title bar.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.TitleStyle> class overrides the base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle.Wrap%2A> property so that it can set the value to `false`.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.TitleStyle.%23ctor%2A> sets the Wrap property to `false`, so that by default, a title bar for a part control does not allow its contents to wrap.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the contents of a title bar wrap in the title bar; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
